name: Darius Cozmic Revelation
overview: Darius Cozmic Revelation is a Darius compilation released in 2021 for the Nintendo Switch and PlayStation 4. It includes an HD remaster of G-Darius and a new revision of Dariusburst AC entitled Dariusburst: Another Chronicle EX+. G-Darius HD Remaster Dariusburst: Another Chronicle EX+ The special Amazon preorder edition of the game also includes a download code for Darius Extra, which was previously only available on the Sega Mega Drive/Genesis Mini.
